member.name: T:BookReduce.BookReduce
member.summary: Map Reduce pattern for counting word frequencies in book sections using Azure Durable Functions.

member.name: T:BookReduce.BookReduce.OrchestrationInput
member.summary: Input class for orchestration with book title and URL pairs

member.name: T:BookReduce.BookReduce.BookInput
member.summary: Represents a book with its title and URL

member.name: T:BookReduce.BookReduce.SectionOutput
member.summary: Output class for mapped books. Each object contains the book name and section of that book. Then a dictionary that maps words in that section to their frequency count.

member.name: T:BookReduce.BookReduce.WordOccurence
member.summary: Class to reduce the mapped results into a single word occurrence object. Rather than a section with many words, this class represents a single occurence of a word in a book section (with frequency).

member.name: M:BookReduce.BookReduce.HttpStart(Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Http.HttpRequestData,Microsoft.DurableTask.Client.DurableTaskClient,Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.FunctionContext)
member.summary: Starts a new orchestration instance of the function. Takes HTTP POST requests with book list.
member.param: Contains the POST request information with book title-URL pairs

member.name: M:BookReduce.BookReduce.RunOrchestrator(Microsoft.DurableTask.TaskOrchestrationContext)
member.summary: Orchestrates the MapReduce pattern for all the given book URLs. Calls the mapper function for each book URL, then calls the reducer function to aggregate results
member.returns: Output of where resulting JSON file can be found and a summary of the mapping procedure

member.name: M:BookReduce.BookReduce.Reducer(BookReduce.BookReduce.SectionOutput[],Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.FunctionContext)
member.summary: Reduces the outputs of map which has many words per section into a single object per word with all occurrences across sections and books.
member.returns: The path to the resulting JSON file with reduced results

member.name: F:BookReduce.BookReduce.StopWords
member.summary: Set of words to ignore when parsing and counting word frequencies.

member.name: M:BookReduce.BookReduce.MapperAsync(BookReduce.BookReduce.BookInput,Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.FunctionContext)
member.summary: Mapper function takes a book input with title and URL, downloads the content, splits into sections, and counts word frequencies in each section. Creates section objects of 5000 words each which are returned together as an array.

member.name: M:BookReduce.WorkerExtensionStartupCodeExecutor.Configure(Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.IFunctionsWorkerApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Configures the worker to register extension startup services.

member.name: T:BookReduce.FunctionExecutorHostBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to enable registration of the custom implementation generated for the current worker.

member.name: M:BookReduce.FunctionExecutorHostBuilderExtensions.ConfigureGeneratedFunctionExecutor(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary: Configures an optimized function executor to the invocation pipeline.

member.name: T:BookReduce.FunctionExecutorAutoStartup
member.summary: Auto startup class to register the custom implementation generated for the current worker.

member.name: M:BookReduce.FunctionExecutorAutoStartup.Configure(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary: Configures the to use the custom implementation generated for the current worker.
member.param: The instance to use for service registration.

member.name: T:BookReduce.GeneratedFunctionMetadataProvider
member.summary: Custom implementation that returns function metadata definitions for the current worker.

member.name: T:BookReduce.WorkerHostBuilderFunctionMetadataProviderExtension
member.summary: Extension methods to enable registration of the custom implementation generated for the current worker.

member.name: M:BookReduce.WorkerHostBuilderFunctionMetadataProviderExtension.ConfigureGeneratedFunctionMetadataProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the GeneratedFunctionMetadataProvider to the service collection. During initialization, the worker will return generated function metadata instead of relying on the Azure Functions host for function indexing.

member.name: T:BookReduce.FunctionMetadataProviderAutoStartup
member.summary: Auto startup class to register the custom implementation generated for the current worker.

member.name: M:BookReduce.FunctionMetadataProviderAutoStartup.Configure(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary: Configures the to use the custom implementation generated for the current worker.
member.param: The instance to use for service registration.
